text: The 2017 ICC World Cricket League Americas Region Qualifiers is an international cricket tournament that is scheduled to take place in Belgrano, Argentina. The winner of the qualifiers will progress to ICC WCL Division 5 which will be staged in September 2017. == Teams == Two teams invited by ICC for the tournament: * * == Fixtures == === Round robin === \---- \---- \---- == Result == {| class="wikitable" |- ! !! 3 - 0 !! |- |style="background: #D0F0C0;"| Qualify for 2017 ICC World Cricket League Division Five || ← →||style="background: #FF8888;"| Did not Qualify for 2017 ICC World Cricket League Division Five |} Source: ICC == References == Category:2017–19 ICC World Cricket League Category:2017 in cricket
title: 2017 ICC World Cricket League Americas Region Qualifiers
